description: Fishing has become a key sticking point in Brexit trade talks, and French fishermen need a good deal.
title: Brexit: Why France is raising the stakes over fishing
title_page: Brexit: Why France is raising the stakes over fishing - BBC News
maintext: "If there's no deal, we're going to ask that the French get the French waters," Mr Merlin explained. "That the Belgians go back to Belgium, and the Dutch as well. Because if all those boats get kicked out and come here [to French fishing grounds], it'll be unbearable."
